title: Mysteryville 2-GOW
description:
/ PROUDLY PRESENTS\



Mysteryville 2 (c) Activision



/RELEASE INFO\



RELEASE DATE 2008-12-08



GAME TYPE Puzzle & Cards



GAME SIZE CD



IMAGE TYPE .iso



PROTECTION None



/GAME INFO\



Return to the eye-popping fun of Mysteryville in this sequel to one of our most

popular games. After solving the cat caper of Mysteryville it&#039;s time for Laura,

ace reporter, to get some well deserved rest. Little does she know she&#039;s about to

stumble on a mystery even more brain-bending than the last! Join Laura on her

search for answers through the shops of Eurekaberg where cleverly hidden items

are waiting to be found. Featuring fantastic full-screen graphics, an intriguing

storyline, and hours of seek-and-find fun, Mysteryville 2 is an original adventure

for the entire family.



/HOW TO PLAY\



1) Unrar



2) Burn or Mount



3) Install



4) Enjoy
